name: TDI_Signage
description:
Sign variations and labelled storage.
Contains a wall cupboard with text.  And a version that acts as a preservation box.
And a barrel with a text widget on top.  Because I have no idea how to do a curved text widget, let alone one curved in 2 dimensions.
A wooden signpost, and a wall sign.  And a rectangular vellum poster, in portrait or landscape arrangement.
To edit the text on the storage, long activate and select interact. <- just so it doesn't pop everytime you put things away.

Note: This mod is a split/sub-section of my RP Assets mod, don't install both

https://discord.gg/h45bTeqNRs
changeNote:
Added 2 Vellum variations using a new Gothic font that is surprisingly readable.
Increased sign and poster max character count.  Obviously if you don't add line breaks this could become unreadable, but with sensible breaks this limits the use less than before.
author: Tiktaalik Dreaming
